amendment.description: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 114-571 to reduce the base Defense Department budget by 1% excluding military/reserve/National Guard personnel, as well as Defense Health Program account.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce the authorization level in the bill by 1%.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A023) Failed by recorded vote: 63 - 360, 1 Present (Roll no. 211).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A023) Failed by recorded vote: 63 - 360, 1 Present (Roll no. 211).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A023) offered by Mr. Polis.
